List Labels

GET

/

api

/

v1

accounts

{account\_id}

conversations

{conversation\_id}

labels

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/conversations/{conversation_id}/labels \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

401

404

Copy

```
{
  "payload": [\
    "<string>"\
  ]
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/list-labels#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/list-labels#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/list-labels#parameter-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the conversation

#### Response

200

200401404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/list-labels#response-payload)

payload

string\[\]

Array of labels

[Previous](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/update-custom-attributes) [Add LabelsAdd labels to a conversation. Note that this API would overwrite the existing list of labels associated to the conversation.\\
\\
